faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services and processes

questions.question: What core services does Al-Watad offer?
questions.answer:
We provide integrated technology solutions, including:
• Enterprise internet and communication services
• Social media account management and operations
• Cybersecurity and security auditing
• Technical support and managed services
• Digital transformation and process automation

questions.question: Do you work only with government entities?
questions.answer: No, our services are available to both public and private sector clients, including educational institutions, banks, commercial enterprises, and non-profit organizations.

questions.question: Can you provide a customized social media marketing plan?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We create tailored monthly marketing plans for each client, covering content development, design, advertising campaigns, posting strategy, and performance analysis.

questions.question: How can I request a quote?
questions.answer: You can contact us via the Request a Quote form or by email. Our team will respond within 24 to 48 hours with full details.

questions.question: Do you provide internet services directly?
questions.answer:
Yes, we offer internet connectivity through various technologies including:
• Fiber to the Home/Building (FTTH)
• Inter-branch connectivity (MPLS / VPN)
• Wireless networks and SD-WAN solutions

questions.question: Can I request consultancy services only, without implementation?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide specialized consultancy services in cybersecurity, infrastructure, digital transformation, and network analysis.

questions.question: Do you offer 24/7 technical support?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide round-the-clock technical support and managed services under signed SLAs.

questions.question: How can I apply for a job at Al-Watad?
questions.answer:
You can send your CV to: careers@al-watad.iq
Or visit our Careers page on the website.
